steps.title: M4 Motorway
steps.text: Take the Leixlip exit (Junction 6) from the M4 motorway.

steps.title: Roundabout
steps.text: Take the left exit on the next roundabout.

steps.title: T-Junction
steps.text: Continue until you reach a T-junction, and then turn left.

steps.title: Arrival
steps.text: The road turns sharp right. JM Motors is 100m on the left. Look for the sign outside.

tip.title: Cannot make it?
tip.text: We offer a free collection and return service. Call us to arrange.
